org.drip.product.credit
Class BasketDefaultSwap

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.product.credit.BasketProduct
          org.drip.product.credit.BasketDefaultSwap
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasketMarketParamRef
public class BasketDefaultSwap
extends BasketProduct

Class implements the basket default swap product contract details. Contains effective date, maturity date, coupon, coupon day count, coupon frequency, basket components, basket notional, loss pay lag, and optionally the outstanding notional schedule and the flat basket recovery.
